titlestmt.titleproper: Advisory Neighborhood Commissions (ANCs) of Washington, D.C. Web Archivedcpl_web002

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2020-09-08 09:51:58 -0400.

did.unittitle: Advisory Neighborhood Commissions (ANCs) of Washington, D.C. Web Archive

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Advisory Neighborhood Commissions (ANCs) of Washington, D.C.

odd.head: General
odd.p: A collection of websites documenting the activities of Washington, DC's Advisory Neighborhood Commissions (ANCs).

phystech.head: Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements
phystech.p: This collection is comprised of dynamic snapshots of sites as they existed at a specific moment, or moments, in time, and should not be confused with current versions of the sites depicted. Due to limitations in web crawling technology, certain page elements may not display as originally intended. This is normal, and we are constantly working to improve capture quality.

odd.head: General
odd.p: D.C. Government homepage for the city's network of Advisory Neighborhood commissions.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition of Web Archives with Archive-It
acqinfo.p: Web crawling is managed through the Internet Archive's Archive-It service. This page includes links to both DCPL's collection and the Internet Archive's public collection.
Crawling is performed periodically by DCPL.

accessrestrict.head: Access to WARC Files
accessrestrict.p: Researchers interested in data analysis with web archives may request a WARC file. WARC files are very large and difficult to work with. Your request may take time to process, and we may be unable to deliver your request remotely. Please consult an archivist if you are interested in advanced research with web archives.

acqinfo.head: Web Archives from General Internet Archive Collections
acqinfo.p: This data is not held by DC Public Library, but within the Internet Archive's collections. The DC Public Library web archiving program has contributed to the Internet Archive's collections since 2016, but has no control over their acquisition processes.

acqinfo.p: This data is not held by DC Public Library, but within the Internet Archive's collections. The DC Public Library web archiving program has contributed to the Internet Archive's collections since 2016, but has no control over their acquisition processes.

odd.head: General
odd.p: Website for ANC covering the River Terrace, Mayfair, Marshall Heights, Kingman Park, Kenilworth, and Eastland Gardens neighborhoods of Washington, D.C.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition of Web Archives with Archive-It
acqinfo.p: Web crawling is managed through the Internet Archive's Archive-It service. This page includes links to both DCPL's collection and the Internet Archive's public collection.
Crawling is performed periodically by DCPL.

accessrestrict.head: Access to WARC Files
accessrestrict.p: Researchers interested in data analysis with web archives may request a WARC file. WARC files are very large and difficult to work with. Your request may take time to process, and we may be unable to deliver your request remotely. Please consult an archivist if you are interested in advanced research with web archives.

acqinfo.p: This data is not held by DC Public Library, but within the Internet Archive's collections. The DC Public Library web archiving program has contributed to the Internet Archive's collections since 2016, but has no control over their acquisition processes.
